title: Garen disabled till nerf please
body: i dont understand how you can lose as garen

replies.body: Thanks everyone for the comments and suggestions. Im enjoying gnar into garen
5.17 Updates is tommorow and Garen did get some minor nerfs. Just wait 1 more day.

Minor is an understatement. His E got buffed, and that is going to be trouble, it makes it much easier to hit with.

The only 'minor' nerf is his base movement and bonus Q movement.

You forgot the ult nerf. Anyway the nerfs looks really minor to me especially when dead's man plate is now an item and he builds black cleaver anyway. Garen is still going to be fast even with his Q nerfed and if you get a youmuu's ghostblade no one can win a race with you except maybe Yi
Actually the ult was not nerfed, just written in a way that will allow people with no maths skills to be able to calculate the damage easier.

Garen is OP yes, completely OP, maybe not. While I have played him a lot recently, and can say he is very strong, build him wrong and you lose. Or just have a fail team and who cares how strong he is. Yes he is a nightmare in top lane, but you just need to play smart, farm safe and don't give any free kills.

That being said, if you sit under your tower all day you can't really farm against a smart Garen and once he starts whacking you with his Q, it hurts and a dash > Q > R combo, game over if you are low health.

In normals you can pretty much expect him to be top most of the time, pick Gnar or someone ranged who has an escape or a Vayne who has some good CC, he chases, you knock him away. If he can't catch you, he can't hurt you.

I always say though, if you can play a champion really well, you can also counter them really well since you know everything about them.
